lines.i: Causes of delay to the unit turnaround process

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.157"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11290)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10610)/@code="67560-3" Turn-around delay NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10609)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with data type CD (CONF:10612), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet TurnAroundDelayType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.54 DYNAMIC (CONF:10611)
NEMSIS Trace: EResponse.12
Contains exactly one [1..1] @classCode with data type ActClassObservation
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11290)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10610)/@code="67560-3" Turn-around delay NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10609)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with data type CD (CONF:10612), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet TurnAroundDelayType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.54 DYNAMIC (CONF:10611)
NEMSIS Trace: EResponse.12
